scripts.docker-build: if [ -d './docker-mongo/cache' ]; then sudo rm -r ./docker-mongo/cache; fi; docker-compose build
scripts.mongo-dev: if [ -d './docker-mongo/cache' ]; then sudo rm -r ./docker-mongo/cache; fi; docker-compose -f mongo-dev.yml up -d
scripts.importdb-dev: docker exec -it mongodb1-dev mkdir -p /database/ && docker cp ./docker-mongo/default-data mongodb1-dev:/database/default-data && docker exec -it mongodb1-dev mongorestore --drop /database/default-data
scripts.updatedb-dev: if [ -d './docker-mongo/default-data' ]; then rm -r ./docker-mongo/default-data; fi; docker exec mongodb1-dev bash -c 'if [ -d '/database/default-data' ]; then rm -r /database/default-data; fi; mongodump --out=/database/default-data ' && docker cp mongodb1-dev:/database/default-data ./docker-mongo/default-data
